scripts.scss: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true -o dist/public/stylesheets src/sass/style.scss --importer node_modules/node-sass-import
scripts.uglify:config: mkdir -p dist/config && uglifyjs src/config/database.js -m -o dist/config/database.js && uglifyjs src/config/passport.js -m -o dist/config/passport.js && uglifyjs src/config/seed.js -m -o dist/config/seed.js && cp -R src/config/seed.json dist/config/seed.json
scripts.uglify:models: mkdir -p dist/models && uglifyjs src/models/Projects.js -m -o dist/models/Projects.js && uglifyjs src/models/Users.js -m -o dist/models/Users.js
scripts.uglify:routes: mkdir -p dist/routes && uglifyjs src/routes/index.js -m -o dist/routes/index.js && uglifyjs src/routes/accomplishments.js -m -o dist/routes/accomplishments.js && uglifyjs src/routes/auth.js -m -o dist/routes/auth.js && uglifyjs src/routes/projects.js -m -o dist/routes/projects.js && uglifyjs src/routes/users.js -m -o dist/routes/users.js
scripts.uglify:utils: mkdir -p dist/utils && uglifyjs src/utils/index.js -m -o dist/utils/index.js && uglifyjs src/utils/all.js -m -o dist/utils/all.js && uglifyjs src/utils/edit.js -m -o dist/utils/edit.js && uglifyjs src/utils/login.js -m -o dist/utils/login.js && uglifyjs src/utils/new.js -m -o dist/utils/new.js && uglifyjs src/utils/register.js -m -o dist/utils/register.js
scripts.uglify:main: uglifyjs src/app.js -m -o dist/app.js && uglifyjs src/cache.js -m -o dist/cache.js
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify:main && npm run uglify:routes && npm run uglify:utils && npm run uglify:models && npm run uglify:config
scripts.html: mkdir -p dist/public && cp -R src/public/templates dist/public/ && cp -R src/public/index.html dist/public/
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run clean && npm run test && npm run lint && npm run uglify && npm run scss && bower install && npm run bundle && npm run imagemin && npm run html
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run start:dev' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:index' 'npm run watch:templates' 'npm run watch:config' 'npm run watch:models' 'npm run watch:routes' 'npm run watch:main' 'npm run watch:app'
